ValidityStateBadInput.summary: The read-only badInput property of the ValidityState interface indicates if the user has provided input that the browser is unable to convert. For example, if you have a number input element whose content is a string.

remarks.para:
-ValidityState valid, customError properties.
-Guide: Constraint validation
-Tutorial: Form data validation

ValidityStateBadInput.value: A boolean that is true if the ValidityState object does not conform to the expected type.
